DsCrono
=======

The DSCrono extension add crono count down time to your browser.

This is a preliminar version and must be changed in the near future.

DsCrono can be installed on all chromium-based browsers.

Installation
=========

Go to Chrome WebStore, find it and install DsCrono into your chromium browser.
After installed, go to manage extension ![manage](./doc/images/manage.png)
and pined this into extensions bar![manage](./doc/images/pined.png).

This extension do not runs on chrome:// page or on blank pages.

Usage
=====

Left click on DsCronos icon and set the crono

- Set hour, minutes and seconds and press enter or click on add button
- Customize default options by select options on DsCrono icon

Optional
=======
- Target time, set target time end
- Title: If enter, this must be displayed down the clock timer.
- Location: Select the clock time position in browser tab
- Clock size: Select small, medium or large size
- All pages: Set the clock in to all open pages
- Background: Select the background color of the clock timer
- Font: Select the font
- Fount color: Select the font color.
- With alert: Select if you want to alert popup when crono finished.
- With sound: Select if you want sound when finished
- Seconds: If sound select, second after end when sound is played.
                   If no sound, seconds after end when the clock is blinking.

What next
========

- Display custom popup when the clock count down end even alert popup
